message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.IT. 

The paper discusses the use of ergodic control for mobile sensors in information gathering tasks, which falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO). The paper also discusses the optimality of these trajectories, which involves optimization and machine learning techniques (cs.AI, cs.LG). The use of submodularity assumptions for repeated measurements suggests a control systems perspective (cs.SY), and the decay of information over time suggests an information theory perspective (cs.IT).
